label: 執権
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: The regent of the Kamakura bakufu, the chieftain of the Hōjō family. Wielded great power. When this bakufu was annihilated, the Ashikaga strove to make sure that their chief of staff (shitsuji, later kanrei) remained firmly under their control. [北条、執事、管領]
